extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains an action for generating a code coverage report using NCover and associating it with the current build.

actionInfo.name: Generate Code Coverage Report
actionInfo.summary: Executes NCover to generate a code coverage report for an application.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Fields

Application to Profile

Provide the executable to profile with NCover and any command line arguments to pass to it. The executable path may either be absolute or relative to the source directory.

Report Type

Specify the type of report to generate. Consult NCover documentation for information about the types of reports. In BuildMaster, you can generate one of the following report types:

  • Full Coverage Report
  • Summary
  • Uncovered Code Sections
  • Classes By Cyclomatic Complexity

Data File

Specify the profiler data file to generate, relative to the target path. If a report file is not specified, a temporary file is used.

Report Name

Provide the name of the report as it will appear in BuildMaster. This is optional.

Includes and Excludes

Specify the rules to apply for including or excluding code from analysis. Rules are semicolon-separated Perl-compatible regular expressions.
